content.question: Which of the following global economic developments most directly contributed to the trend shown in the chart after 1980 ?

choices.label: The end of communism following the collapse of the Soviet Union
The formation of regional trading blocs encouraging free trade
The increased shifting of global manufacturing to the Pacific Rim
The lowering of immigration restrictions for unskilled migrants because of United Nationsâ€™ treaties

content.answer: The increased shifting of global manufacturing to the Pacific Rim

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
